revision.text:
{{wiktionary|double-cross|doublecross}}
'''Double Cross''', '''Double Crossed''', or their variants may refer to: {{TOC right}}
==Art, entertainment, and media== ===Comics=== * ''Double Cross'', an issue of ''Buffy the Vampire Slayer'' collected in ''[[Food Chain (Buffy comic)#Double Cross|Food Chain]]'' * ''Double Cross!'', a comic by [[Tony Consiglio]]
===Fictional entities=== * The "Double-Cross" (of betrayal), the emblem of Hynkel's fascist regime in Charlie Chaplin's comedy film ''[[The Great Dictator]]'' (1940)
=== Film === * ''Double Cross'', an installment of the 1940 ''[[Mysterious Doctor Satan]]'' film serial * [[Double Cross (1941 film)|''Double Cross'' (1941 film)]], a film by Albert H. Kelley * [[Double Cross (1951 film)|''Double Cross'' (1951 film)]], a film by Riccardo Freda * [[Double Cross (1972 film)|''Double Cross'' (1972 film)]], a Bollywood action film * [[Double Cross (1992 film)|''Double Cross'' (1992 film)]], a Japanese crime film also released under the title ''The Triple Cross'' * [[Double Cross (2005 film)|''Double Cross'' (2005 film)]], a Bollywood film * [[Double Cross (2006 film)|''Double Cross'' (2006 film)]], a television film, starring [[Yancy Butler]] and [[Bruce Boxleitner]] * [[Double-Cross (2014 film)|''Double-Cross'' (2014 film)]], a Ghanaian film * [[Doublecross (1956 film)|''Doublecross'' (1956 film)]], a film featuring Allan Cuthbertson * ''[[Doublecrossed]]'' (1991), HBO television film about Barry Seal, starring Dennis Hopper
===Games=== * ''Double Cross'', a [[List of The Price Is Right pricing games#Double Cross|segment game]] from ''The Price is Right'' * [[Double Cross (video game)|''Double Cross'' (video game)]], a 2019 video game developed by 13AM Games
===Literature=== * [[Double Cross (novel)|''Double Cross'' (novel)]], a 2007 novel by James Patterson * ''Double Cross'', a novel in the [[Noughts & Crosses (novel series)#Double Cross|Noughts and Crosses]] series by Malorie Blackman
===Music=== * [[Double Cross (album)|''Double Cross'' (album)]]'', a 1968 album by Hank Crawford * ''[[The Double Cross]]'', a 2011 album by Sloan * ''The Double-Cross'', an album by [[Tempest (Celtic rock band)|Tempest]]
===Television=== * [[Double Cross (Sliders)|"Double Cross" (''Sliders'')]], an episode of ''Sliders'' * [[Double-Cross (CSI)|"Double-Cross" (''CSI'')]], an episode of ''CSI''
== Other uses == * [[Double cross (betrayal)]] * Double cross stitch, a type of [[Cross stitches|cross stitch]] embroidery * [[Double Cross System]], a Second World War counterespionage and deception operation of MI5 * [[Double Cross Vodka]], a vodka originating from the Slovak Republic
== See also == * [[Coat of arms of Hungary]] * [[Coat of arms of Lithuania]] * [[Coat of arms of Slovakia]] * [[Cross of Lorraine]], a two-barred cross associated with the Free French during World War II * [[Double dagger]] or â€¡ * [[Patriarchal cross]], a two-barred variant of the Christian cross, especially in the Eastern Orthodox Church {{disambig}}
